name: StandArtInternational-TheWorld
description:
Precautions (Be sure to observe this)

  1. This model is free and not available on any paid website service.

  2. Do not change the name of this model!

  3. In using the model, all responsibility lies with the user.

  4. Do not use to create NSFW and criminal purpose.

Please supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ to get recommendation prompts and exlusive LoRA dump or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Follow me and add a ❤️ to receive future updates. Huggingface / CivitAi

modelVersions.description:
checkpoint The World First version, I will always update the model! so follow me and ❤️ to get notifications.

Use ClearVae for better results.

My goal in uploading this model is to be used as a mix material, instead of using it as an image generation. if interested please mix this model with your model!
